function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective treatment for COVID-19","Impact":"Increased severity and mortality of the disease","Mitigation":"Research and development of effective antiviral treatments and vaccines","Technologies":"Advanced molecular biology and biotechnology for drug discovery","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and the general population","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic transmission of the virus","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and controlling the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Widespread testing, contact tracing, and public health education","Technologies":"Rapid diagnostic tests and data analytics for contact tracing","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare workers, and the general population","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inefficient prevention measures for viral transmission","Impact":"Widespread and rapid spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementation of comprehensive public health measures, including social distancing, mask-wearing, and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Smart surveillance systems, advanced disinfection technologies, and public health communication tools","People":"The general population and high-risk individuals","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and community leaders"}]}
